articles.author: ICC
articles.title: Smriti Mandhana, Shafali Verma lead India to big win against Pakistan - ICC Cricket
articles.description: The duo helped chase down Pakistan's 108 in just 14.1 overs in their Asia Cup encounter
articles.content: *]:mb-6 [&>*]:lg:mb-8">Openers Smriti Mandhana and Shafali Verma put on a quickfire opening partnership to help India chase down Pakistan's total in 14.1 overs in the Women's Asia Cup T20 g… [+607 chars]
